name: threejs-playground
description: A Three.js playground with AI-powered features

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:embedding"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../shader-playground && npm install && cd ../embedding-service && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
